description: PXL files can also be exported to XLS files in Pocket Excel by using the "Word 97/2000" type in the Save As... menu. Older versions of Microsoft ActiveSync can also convert PXL files to XLS files.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pxl file in Ghostscript GhostPCL
images.caption: PXL file open in Ghostscript GhostPCL
